participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Emily has a passion for storytelling and enjoys expressing herself through writing.
participant_1.background: My favorite websites are about 80's music and biographies of authors. I'm not much of a swimmer, but I love my new sneakers! I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business. I remember writing stories with my sister when we were kids. I wonder if my uncle would be able to give me some pointers about fishing.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Insecure yet introspective, Jake is a budding artist who grapples with self-doubt but has a desire to explore his creativity.
participant_2.background: I hide things from my family to protect them. my favorite color is green. I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind. I worry about my image. My eyes are bright blue.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint, but it can be hard for me to get into it because I worry about my image.
I get that. I used to write stories, but I stopped because I was worried what people would think of them.
Oh, that's too bad. What kind of stories did you write?
I wrote a lot of fantasy and sci-fi. I also wrote some historical fiction.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be able to write stories, but I'm not creative enough.
I think everyone is creative, you just have to find your way of expressing it.
Thanks, maybe I'll give it a try again.
I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Do you have any favorite books?
I love all of the Harry Potter books, and I also love the Lord of the Rings books.
I've heard good things about those books, but I've never read them.
I might have to check them out.
